Special Powers
PUDDLE LEAP: At the beginning of the game, generate up to 6 water terrain markers anywhere on the map that aren't within 3 squares of each other. // FREE: If Frog Thor occupies water terrain, place him in a square of water terrain within 6 squares and line of fire.
WHAT DO YOU CALL A 6'6" FIGHTING-MAD BULL FROG?: Close Combat Expert. Frog Thor has [Standard damage symbol]. Protected: Pulse Wave.

The damage reduction, mobility, and just raw stats for his cost is unmatched.[/QUOTE] Goop is all over the place with his likes and dislikes, he will call one figure amazing with the same stats as another figure and call that one terrible. He half reads every unit and comments under all of them often being wrong. Also in his mind every figure should be below 50pts, have 10+clicks with 12+ attack 18+ def and 4+ damage. He's delusional on most of his posts and really puts a dampener on almost every figure he comments on, which is all of them. Anyone looking at any of these figures in this set or the previous ones, just ignore Goop's comments and play the ones you want to. His opinion is usually wrong.
February 17, 2022
heyodern
If you spread out his water tokens, five away from your starting area and the left edge and in a 3x2 grid exactly six squares apart, Frog Thor can "water charge" and hit anyone within a 16X23 area. If you nudge the three tokens on the right one square forward, you're now threatening all but 12 squares on a normal map. If you have a map with some natural water on it, or one hit of perplex, and Frog Thor can own the entire board. 1XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX 2XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX 3XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX 4XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX 5XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX 6XXXXXwXXXXXwXXXXXwXXXXX XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX XXXXXwXXXXXwXXXXXwXXXXX7 XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX8 XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX9 XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX0 XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX1 XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX2

Really fun, point-efficient dial. Working his dolphin symbol and tiny size, he will be a pain to shoot. With his low cost and leadership, he will fit very nicely on theme teams for all his keywords.

His back half is actually better than his front half with the special power CCE and higher def. The puddle jump stuff is kinda cute and combos well with dolphin symbol ability. He's only 40 points, nothing amazing but not bad at all.
